Package voyages

Class Platform

java.lang.Object
voyages.Platform
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Platform extends Object implements Serializable
The Platform class. It represents the platform that contains all the teenagers.
See Also:

    • addExchange

      public Exchange addExchange(CountryName hostCountry, CountryName guestCountry) throws SameCountryException, SameTeenagerException
      This method add an exchange to the platform.
      Parameters:
      hostCountry - a CountryName representing the host country.
      guestCountry - a CountryName representing the guest country.
      Returns:
      A new Exchange if it was not already present, or unchanged Exchange if already here.
      Throws:
      SameCountryException
      SameTeenagerException
